transforms.code:
prevYear = value['currentYear'] - 1
	nextYear = value['currentYear'] + 1
	if  value['currentMonth'] in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6):
		fiscalYear = str(prevYear) + "-" + str(value['currentYear'])
	else:
		fiscalYear = str(value['currentYear']) + "-" + str(nextYear)
	return fiscalYear

config.script:
self.getSibling("Table_Billing").props.selection.selectedRow = None
	self.getSibling("Table_Billing").props.selection.selectedColumn = None
	self.getSibling("Table_Participants").props.selection.selectedRow = None
	self.getSibling("Table_Participants").props.selection.selectedColumn = None
	self.getSibling("Table_Referrals").props.selection.selectedRow = None
	self.getSibling("Table_Referrals").props.selection.selectedColumn = None
	selectedColumn = self.props.selection.selectedColumn
	if selectedColumn == "edit":
			## open the side pane only when edit is allowed
		id = int(self.props.selection.data[0].id)
		edit = self.props.selection.data[0].edit
		if edit:
			sectionName = "Bed Numbers"
			selectedFiscalYear = self.view.params.fiscal_year
			
			params = {"id":id, "sectionName":sectionName, "selectedFiscalYear":selectedFiscalYear}
			system.perspective.print("opening dock with params below " )
			system.perspective.print(params)
			
			system.perspective.openDock("PreviewResidential", params=params)

messageHandlers.script:
# implement your handler here
	## get all 4 datasets
	datasetBedNumbers = self.getChild("Table_BedNumbers").custom.sql_data
	datasetBilling = self.getChild("Table_Billing").custom.sql_data
	datasetParticipants = self.getChild("Table_Participants").custom.sql_data
	datasetReferrals = self.getChild("Table_Referrals").custom.sql_data
	
	## filter the required columns
	columnsRequired = ["parameter_display_value","july_value","aug_value","sept_value","oct_value","nov_value","dec_value","jan_value","feb_value","march_value","april_value","may_value","june_value","totalValue"]
	datasetBedNumbers = system.dataset.filterColumns(datasetBedNumbers, columnsRequired)
	datasetBilling = system.dataset.filterColumns(datasetBilling, columnsRequired)
	datasetParticipants = system.dataset.filterColumns(datasetParticipants, columnsRequired)
	datasetReferrals = system.dataset.filterColumns(datasetReferrals, columnsRequired)
	
	## set space if parameter is Number of participants
	for i in range(0,datasetBilling.getRowCount()):
		parameter_display_value = datasetBilling.getValueAt(i,'parameter_display_value')
		if parameter_display_value.startswith('Number of Participants'):
			datasetBilling = system.dataset.setValue(datasetBilling, i, "parameter_display_value", "           "+str(parameter_display_value))
					
	## set headers for datasets
	julyCol = "JUL '" + str(self.view.custom.Year1)
	augCol = "AUG '" + str(self.view.custom.Year1)
	septCol = "SEP '" + str(self.view.custom.Year1)
	octCol = "OCT '" + str(self.view.custom.Year1)
	novCol = "NOV '" + str(self.view.custom.Year1)
	decCol = "DEC '" + str(self.view.custom.Year1)
	janCol = "JAN '" + str(self.view.custom.Year2)
	febCol = "FEB '" + str(self.view.custom.Year2)
	marchCol = "MAR '" + str(self.view.custom.Year2)
	aprilCol = "APR '" + str(self.view.custom.Year2)
	mayCol = "MAY '" + str(self.view.custom.Year2)
	juneCol = "JUN '" + str(self.view.custom.Year2)

	columnHeadersForExportBedNumbers = ["Bed Numbers",julyCol,augCol,septCol,octCol,novCol,decCol,janCol,febCol,marchCol,aprilCol,mayCol,juneCol,"Totals"]
	datasetBedNumbers.setColumnNames(columnHeadersForExportBedNumbers)
	
	columnHeadersForExportBilling = ["Residential Billing",julyCol,augCol,septCol,octCol,novCol,decCol,janCol,febCol,marchCol,aprilCol,mayCol,juneCol,"Totals"]
	datasetBilling.setColumnNames(columnHeadersForExportBilling)
	
	columnHeadersForExportParticipants = ["Participants",julyCol,augCol,septCol,octCol,novCol,decCol,janCol,febCol,marchCol,aprilCol,mayCol,juneCol,"Totals"]
	datasetParticipants.setColumnNames(columnHeadersForExportParticipants)
	
	columnHeadersForExportReferrals = ["Referrals",julyCol,augCol,septCol,octCol,novCol,decCol,janCol,febCol,marchCol,aprilCol,mayCol,juneCol,"Totals"]
	datasetReferrals.setColumnNames(columnHeadersForExportReferrals)
	
	filename = 'ResidentialDashboard_' + str(system.date.format(system.date.now(),"yyyyMMddHHmmss")) + '.xls'		
	
	xlFile = system.dataset.toExcel(True, [datasetBedNumbers,datasetBilling,datasetParticipants,datasetReferrals],True,['Bed Numbers','Residential Billing','Participants','Referrals'])
	
	system.perspective.download(filename, xlFile)

import traceback
	try:
		#Generate the report
		project = "HMS"
		path = "Overview/ResidentialTable_Report"
		parameters = {'fiscal_year':self.view.params.fiscal_year,
					'year1':self.view.custom.Year1,
					'year2':self.view.custom.Year2
					}
		pdfFile = system.report.executeReport(path,project,parameters,fileType='pdf')
		filename = 'ResidentialDashboard_' + str(system.date.format(system.date.now(),"yyyyMMddHHmmss")) + '.pdf'

		system.perspective.download(filename, pdfFile)
	except:   
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Residential Dashboard tableToPDF")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)
